00014 #include <boost/function.hpp>

00016 namespace x2d {
00017     
00018 class kernel;
00019     
00020 namespace time {
00021     
00025     class timer
00026     {
00027         friend class kernel;
00028         typedef boost::function<void(const clock_info&)> handler_type;
00029         
00030     public:
00031         
00032         timer(kernel& k, time::clock& c);        
00033         timer(kernel& k);        
00034         ~timer();
00035         
00036         void handler(const handler_type& h);
00037         void set(double freq);
00038         void compensate(double delta);
00039         void cancel();
00040         
00041         bool operator < ( const timer& other ) const
00042         {
00043             return fire_/clock_.stretch_ < other.fire_/other.clock_.stretch_;
00044         }
00045         
00046     private:
00047         kernel&       kernel_;
00048         time::clock&  clock_;
00049         double        fire_;        
00050         double        frequency_;
00051         
00052         clock_info    start_clock_info_;
00053         handler_type  handler_;
00054 
00055         void process(const clock_info& ci);
00056         
00057         double firetime() const 
00058         {
00059             return fire_;
00060         }
00061     };
00062     
00063 } // namespace time
00064 } // namespace x2d
00065 
00066 using namespace x2d::time;

00068 #endif // __X2D_TIMER_H__
